  • Method Details

    • cercaBranoMusicale

      public static String[][] cercaBranoMusicale(String brano, Database db) throws SQLException, RemoteException
      Method for searching for a song by title
      Parameters:
      brano - A parameter of type String that expresses the song to input to the method, which will return all songs with the song string in the title
      db - A parameter of type Database
      Returns:
      Returns a matrix of strings containing song titles and their unique codes
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception that occurs in Java when there's an error while working with a database using SQL (Structured Query Language) operations; SQL exceptions are typically thrown when there are issues such as: connection errors, syntax errors, constraint violations, data type mismatches, transaction issues, deadlocks and resource exhaustion.
      RemoteException

    • cercaBranoMusicale

      public static String[][] cercaBranoMusicale(String autore, int anno, Database db) throws SQLException, RemoteException
      Method for searching for a song by author and year
      Parameters:
      autore - A parameter of type String that expresses the name of the author whose songs you want to search for
      anno - A parameter of type int that expresses the year of release of the song
      db - A parameter of type Database
      Returns:
      Returns a matrix of strings containing song titles and their unique codes
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception that occurs in Java when there's an error while working with a database using SQL (Structured Query Language) operations; SQL exceptions are typically thrown when there are issues such as: connection errors, syntax errors, constraint violations, data type mismatches, transaction issues, deadlocks and resource exhaustion.
      RemoteException

    • getCod

      public static String getCod(String canzone, Database db) throws SQLException, RemoteException
      Method that returns the code of a song
      Parameters:
      canzone - A parameter of type String that expresses the name of the song
      db - A parameter of type Database
      Returns:
      The method returns the code of a song as a String
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception that occurs in Java when there's an error while working with a database using SQL (Structured Query Language) operations; SQL exceptions are typically thrown when there are issues such as: connection errors, syntax errors, constraint violations, data type mismatches, transaction issues, deadlocks and resource exhaustion.
      RemoteException - Exception that occurs in Java applications using the Remote Method Invocation (RMI) technology; this exception is thrown when issues arise during the invocation of remote methods through RMI; some of the situations that can cause a RemoteException include: connection issues, remote exceptions, class not found, timeouts, security issues and serialization issues.

    • registraVotoEmozione

      public static void registraVotoEmozione(Query query) throws SQLException, RemoteException

      Parameters:
      query - A parameter of type Query
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception that occurs in Java when there's an error while working with a database using SQL (Structured Query Language) operations; SQL exceptions are typically thrown when there are issues such as: connection errors, syntax errors, constraint violations, data type mismatches, transaction issues, deadlocks and resource exhaustion.
      RemoteException - Exception that occurs in Java applications using the Remote Method Invocation (RMI) technology; this exception is thrown when issues arise during the invocation of remote methods through RMI; some of the situations that can cause a RemoteException include: connection issues, remote exceptions, class not found, timeouts, security issues and serialization issues.

      public static void popola(Database db) throws SQLException, IOException, IOException
      Method to populate the song database
      Parameters:
      db - A parameter of type Database
      Throws:

      IOException - Exception used to handle input and output errors
